name: Rotatetris
description:
Welcome to Rotatetris!

Rotatetris is a puzzle game which consists of two words — “rotate” and “tetris”.

The rules of the game are a piece of cake, just rotate runes clockwise or counterclock-wise in order to collect as many tetris-shape pieces (tetrominoes) as you can. Tap on ruby gem so that it will be selected the group of runes to rotate. The game ends when the board is filled.

Have fun!
